publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3236 Ross Finnie: Water Environment and Water Services (Scotland) Bill - Stage 1-That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Water Environment and Water Services (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Mr Andy Kerr*, Iain Gray*, Allan Wilson*
